name: SACI-PERERÊ - Xylography #07
description:
Saci-Pererê is one of the best-known figures in Brazilian folklore. Playful and mischievous, he loves to have fun with people and animals and possesses magical powers. Saci's day is celebrated on October 31. The date was specially chosen to value the lores and myths of Brazil as opposed to foreign folkloric influences, such as Halloween. 

Digital art inspired by Xylographs and cordel from the Brazilian northeast.

All rights reserved to Mohzah Nascimento.
